text: Vot skazal Musa (Moisey) svoyemu narodu: «O moy narod! Vy byli nespravedlivy k sebe, kogda stali poklonyat'sya tel'tsu. Pokaytes' pered svoim Sozdatelem i ubeyte sami sebya (pust' nevinnyye ub'yut bezzakonnikov). Tak budet luchshe dlya vas pered vashim Sozdatelem». Zatem On prinyal vashi pokayaniya. Voistinu, On - Prinimayushchiy pokayaniya, Miloserdnyy
